SEARCH
Package de.unistuttgart.ils.aircraftsystemsarchitect.engine.graphics.render

Class ScalingEngine

java.lang.Object
de.unistuttgart.ils.aircraftsystemsarchitect.engine.graphics.render.ScalingEngine
public class ScalingEngine extends Object
The ScalingEngine is used to flexibly adapt all rendered objects to the screen size.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ScalingEngine()
    Create a new ScalingEngine, automatically creates affine transform objects that will be used for shape scaling.
